subject: Renew father's day page
preview: Hi Hana,  You're very welcome, glad I could help!   Always happy to assist if anything else comes up.

full_threads.body:
Hi Hana,

You're very welcome, glad I could help!

Always happy to assist if anything else comes up.

Perfect, thank you

Kindest regards,

Hana

reservations functions and events

https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo



New Private Dining Room

Savour love.fish in style!

Our new Private Dining Room offers an intimate harbour escape for up to 16 guests. Relish fresh local seafood, from succulent crab to buttery barramundi, paired with stunning waterfront views. Perfect for birthdays, corporate events, or special celebrations. Customise your menu, sip curated wines, and let our dedicated team make your event unforgettable. Book now for exclusive dining that hooks every moment!



For any group reservations of 10 guests and more, please contact our team bookings@lovefish.com.au for more information.

7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

bookings@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

Hi Hana,

Thank you so much for letting me know!

I've updated the Father's Day page so the logo can be seen now:
Father’s Day Page


Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like me to tweak, always happy to help

Hi Allie,

Thank you.

I am talking about the logo on father's Day page.



Kindest regards,

Hana

Hi Hana,

Thank you so much for letting me know.

I’ve just updated the book now button on the Father’s Day page with the link you shared, it’s all sorted now.

I can see the logo showing on my end, so I’ve attached a screenshot of what it looks like here. If you let me know which page you're having trouble with, I’ll jump in and take a closer look.


Let me know if there’s anything else you need, always happy to help!

And our logo isn't showing up correctly. Can you please fix? Thank you



Kindest regards,

Hana

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Good morning team, can you please take out the Father's Day from archive and make it current? Link below.
https://www.lovefish.com.au/fathers-day/


Please add it in the drop box under EVENTS



Kindest regards,

Hana
